title: Meditation: RAIN on Self-Blame (2019-04-17)
itunes:title: Meditation: RAIN on Self-Blame
description:
Meditation: RAIN on Self-Blame (2019-04-17) - One of the greatest roots of suffering is being at war with ourselves. This meditation, based on the acronym RAIN (recognize-allow-investigate-nurture), guides us in releasing the armoring of blame, and relating to our inner life with greater understanding and compassion.

For more resources on RAIN:
www.tarabrach.com/rain/.
